value:
My brother, Arvis, is a remarkable
man. Yet for all he has given to our
nation, there are...times I fear him.

Princess Sharena is a gentle, if
slightly boisterous, person. In truth,
she reminds me of someone dear...

You always seem so busy. If there is
ever any way I can aid you, please do
not hesitate to ask.

I cannot seem to find the castle
library. Could you show me the
way, $Nu?

Riders charging to the front lines...
Spells of all types to consider... There
are so many tactics to account for.

Greetings. My name is Azelle. It is
always a pleasure to meet an ally of
$Nf.

I feel new strength burning within.
This was the power of crusader
Fjalar...and now, of me!

My words and deeds must always be
worthy of House Velthomer.
Would that I had the talent...
This strength will not go to waste.

I am Azelle of House Velthomer.
Though my magic cannot compare
to my brother's, it is at your disposal.

I left House Velthomer behind to save
someone I cared for... It's a little
embarrassing to remember it now.$k$pLeaving allowed me to experience the
world, meet dear friends, and witness
the upheaval of war firsthand.$k$pCertainly it would have been safer to
stay at home, but I would have been
crushed in the shadow of my brother.$k$pNow, after being summoned here by
you and battling alongside the Order
of Heroes...$k$pI am pleased to say that I have come
to know myself in a new way. I can
stand alongside you with confidence.$k$pI only hope that I may continue to
serve, and that we all live to see the
day when peace comes to this world.
はっ！
それっ！
うああっ！
そんな…！
I, too, shall be strong!
You will pay!
Enough!
Flames!
Please... Carry on...
Hehe
I am Azelle, from the house of Velthomer. I may be no match for my brother, but all the same, I am happy to be here.
Whoa there! You gave me a fright!
Arvis...he was more than a brother to me. More than a father, even. But now...
Lord Sigurd has such a warm mien. The contrast with my brother could not be more stark.
I must be a burden to Arvis—just a talentless younger brother.
I'll find my own path.
No matter what happens, you are welcome to speak to me about it. I want to help you as much as I am able.
Yes?
And what now?
Me? Are you sure?
